attributes.action: Set up this site so that a vote for and against a petition is possible.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Unfortunately this site is not fair to people with an alternative view to that expressed. Once a word is used in a petition for something it cannot be used against something and in some cases there is no alternative word to use for an opposite petition.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to team@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
